combatSkills.name: Stomping Whiteout
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Ultra Water M.Attack w/Ultra Unguard Rate and Dmg. received (Attack Type: All and Single Targets)+25%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Gathering Sleet
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Fast Mid Water M.Attack w/Hi Critical Rate and [Self] Mag. & Water Attack Dmg.+60% and [Foe] Dmg. received (Attack Type: Single Target)+20%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Azure Wind
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Super Water M.Attack w/temp Mag. Boost & Hi Unguard Rate and Str. & Mag.-45%/2 turns

combatSkills.name: Focus Avalanche
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Slow Hi Water M.Attack Dmg.+85% per each Target's skill effect that increases Dmg. received (Attack Type: Single Target) and Target's skill effect that increases Dmg. received (Attack Type: Single Target)-1 turn afterward

passiveSkills.name: Watery Destruction
passiveSkills.description: When countering, regular Water M.Attack a Foe Dmg.+35% per each Target's skill effect that increases Dmg. received (Attack Type: Single Target)
